name: PdfGptIndexer (raghavan)
description: [项目级] RAG based tool for indexing and searching PDF text data using OpenAI API and FAISS (Facebook AI Similarity Search) index, designed for rapid information retrieval and superior search accuracy.。来源: https://github.com/raghavan/PdfGptIndexer

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
RAG based tool for indexing and searching PDF text data using OpenAI API and FAISS (Facebook AI Similarity Search) index, designed for rapid information retrieval and superior search accuracy.

来源: https://github.com/raghavan/PdfGptIndexer
语言: Python
Stars: 679
